features: 【PURIFIERS FUNCTION】3-Level Fan Speeds, It also comes with 3 timers for 2. 4. 8 hours. Adjust the air purifiers fan speeds for different needs and time.

【40°SURROUND】Air Purifier Utilizes a HEPA, 360-degree air inlets technology, 40-degree rotating air vents. air purifier refreshes the air per hour in rooms up to 323 ft² / 30 m², Adopt inset activated carbon in the air purifier . purify 99. 97% odors, pet dander wait.
【WITH LOW NOISE AND LOW SPEED】Brushless DC motor achieve 30 dB, With low noise and low speed, it's the perfect companion for a good night's sleep.
【APPLICATION】The air purifier does not require installation, just plug in the power adapter to work. 1*machine, 1*power adapter, 1*manual

【AIR PURIFIERS】Air Purifiers come with a 2 year warranty, If you are not happy with your Air Purifiers for any reason, we will give you a FULL REFUND or exchange, no questions asked. At the end of the day we want all of our customers to know that they will be treated just like family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great BUT...
reviews.reviewText: I do really love it BUT where im supposed to find the air filters if they dont provide any information :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Working good so far! *updated after unit broke
reviews.reviewText: ***UpdateIt worked fine for a week, then the top part stopped moving and it started making a horrific grinding noise so I shut it off and checked to make sure all the parts were still together tight, but no matter what it won't stop making that noise or start the fan moving again, and then it started shutting off if you had it on for more than 15-30 seconds. Which is too bad, because I liked the look of it and how easy it was to get the filter in and out of, etc.------------I needed an air purifier for a small room where I have my bench for working on electronics and other small projects in it, and the room doesn't have any windows in it so it can feel stuffy and/or smelly when I have been in there a lot on certain days during the summer, etc. Plus I needed something to filter out dust and other particles for when I am painting things by hand and want the surface to be nice and clean and smooth, and this is working out perfectly so far. There is a noticeable difference in the amount of dust that I am seeing building up on surfaces, even after just using it for a week.It was simple to set up and use and has plenty of handy features too. I wish it would have been black, but that is just a personal preference and not something that affects the way it works or anything other than not matching my other black stuff. lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very quiet and works well but finding filters may be tough
reviews.reviewText: Set this up in our bedroom and have noticed a decline in dust. We only run it at night while sleeping, it is whisper silent and the timer works nicely. It is limited to 1,2, or 3 hours timer run time or left to run non stop. The lights can be a little bright for the bedroom if you want complete darkness. My only complaint is that the filter is not designed to be cleaned and reused. And ordering filters from China for this machine is not desirable. I will do my best to clean the included filter or find a suitable substitute I can buy locally. That will not stop is from using this air filter as it works well.
